author: Vicki Shadrick Webster County Extension Agent for Agriculture and Natural Resources
title: Holiday budgeting made easy: Stress less, celebrate more! | Columnists | the-messenger.com
text:
The holidays are nearly here, a wonderful time to spend time with loved ones. But let's be honestâ€”all those extra purchases for gifts, food, and decorations can make your spending escalate quickly. If you haven't been saving throughout the year, you might already be feeling that familiar financial pinch that comes with the season.
Holiday budgeting made easy: Stress less, celebrate more!
- By Vicki Shadrick Webster County Extension Agent for Agriculture and Natural Resources
0

Source: Rick Durham, Department of Horticulture professor
Source: Nichole Huff, extension specialist for family resource management
Source: Ellen Crocker, Department of Forestry and Natural Resources assistant professor
Source: Jennifer Hunter, UK financial extension specialist
